{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Fossilized Bird |image = [[File:Fossilized Bird.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Fossilized Bird''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] }} ==Description== The '''Fossilized Bird''' is a type of [[Fossils|Fossil]]. ==Details== It can be used alongside [[File:Fossilized Drake.png|30px]] [[Fossilized Drake]] and [[File:Fossilized Dino.png|30px]] [[Fossilized Dino]] at the Fossil Master to purchase Dracozolt and Arctozolt, respectively. ==Mine Layout== The Fossilized Bird appears in the Underground as a 4x4 sized object.

[[File:FossilizedBirdMine.png|100px]] ==Uses== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Fossil !! Pok√©mon !! Cost |- | [[File:Fossilized Bird.png|30px]]
[[File:Fossilized Drake.png|30px]] || [[File:Dracozolt.png|40px]] Dracozolt || 25,000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[File:Fossilized Bird.png|30px]]
[[File:Fossilized Dino.png|30px]] || [[File:Arctozolt.png|40px]] Arctozolt || 25,000 {{Questpoints}} |} ==Acquisition== Fossilized Bird can be found in the [[Underground]] and traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]].
{{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Fossils]] __NOTOC__
